Name: The Love Twins
Text: You encounter an Incubus and a Succubus. 'Hey Lover,' the incubus says, 'You're coming home with one of us, so choose who it'll be.'

Outcomes.Text: The Incubus grins, 'We're going to have a great time.'
The Succubus blows you a kiss, 'I'll show you a good time, sweetie.'
